articles.author: Aya Wagatsuma
articles.title: Asian Shares Decline as Bonds Extend Selloff: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian equities declined for a second day along with bonds, as traders consider cooling expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts for the rest of the year.
articles.content:
Asian equities declined for a second day along with bonds, as traders consider cooling expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts for the rest of the year.
